titleStmt.title: The true Catholike Collected out of the oracles, and psalteries of the Holy Ghost. for instruction, and deuotion.
titleStmt.author: Fernández de Ribera, Rodrigo, 1579-1631.
Packer, Thomas, fl. 1628-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Miller] for E. Blackmore,

notesStmt.note: Preface translated out of Rodrigo Fernández de Ribera, by Thomas Packer--STC.
K3 is a separate title page, with same imprint, reading: Psalteries of the Holy Ghost.
M5 is a separate title page, with same imprint, reading: Psalmes in sicknesse.
Errata on recto of final leaf.
Some print faded and show thorugh; some pages stained, with loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
